title: "Dissociable Neural Representations of Adversarially Perturbed Images in Convolutional Neural Networks and the Human Brain"
excerpt: "Despite the remarkable similarities between convolutional neural networks (CNN) and the human brain, CNNs still fall behind humans in many visual tasks, indicating that there still exist considerable differences between the two systems."
